collection.title: SARIT Testing Inventory
collection.creator: Andrew Ollett
collection.coverage: Selected Sanskrit texts for testing CTS requests.
collection.description: Texts chosen to test the CTS protocol as applied to SARIT (Sanskrit and Prakrit) texts.
